heading: Today
text: Mostly cloudy with rain showers. Showers tapering off in the south in the afternoon. Chance of a rumble of thunder. Highs in the mid to upper 50s north, increasing to the low to mid 60s in the warmer southern valleys. Wind becoming southwest near 10 mph.

heading: Tonight
text: Showers tapering off, periods of clearing developing in the southeast, mostly cloudy elsewhere. Lows from the mid 30s to near 40, mid 40s in the Champlain Valley. Southwest wind at 5 to 10 mph.

heading: Thursday
text: Mostly cloudy, some clearing developing in the southeast becoming cloudy later in the day. Good chance of showers north Route 4, more scattered to the south. Highs in the low to mid 50s, upper 50s in the valleys in the far south. South to southwest wind 10 to 15 mph.
